## Welcome {-}
Welcome to **Geocomputation**, a course that introduces you to both the principles of spatial analysis and the use of programming for data analysis.

Content to be made available at the start of the academic year. The content for 2021-2022 has now been archived and can be found here: [[Link]](https://jtvandijk.github.io/GEOG0030)
